author: jdotpz
content:
#Stooge shames me into adding security headers
[Stefan](https://github.com/st3fan) [Arentz](https://mozillians.org/en-US/u/st3fan/) made a [new tool](https://github.com/st3fan/moz-stooge) that scans our URL's daily and reports on security headers that are missing, SSL certs, and other security issues.

Stooge is pretty nice!
![alt text](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2273146/stoogerules.JPG "Better than a dancing otter")
